quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易混淆形近词"warm-hearted"(热心的)，或字面误解为"热血沸腾的"(情感激动的)，而非生物学上的"恒温的"。
quiz_item.sentence: Unlike snakes, which need the sun to warm their bodies, birds and mammals are **warm-blooded** and can keep their temperature stable even on cold days.

option.definition: 恒温的（指动物能够保持体温恒定）
热血沸腾的，情感激动的
